content: the wanderers relaxed fit crochet cardigan is an oversized draping cardigan with long sleeves and ribbing on the base and sleeves it features a simple ribbed neckline and does not have buttons the main panels are crocheted in a simple triple crochet and half_double_crochet stitch pattern the oversized sleeves uses another stitch combination of double_crochet and the puff the wanderers relaxed fit crochet cardigan pattern will also show you how to add pockets and a thick ribbing around the neckline the wanderers relaxed fit crochet cardigan is a free and easy crochet pattern available as a size inclusive made to measure pattern it is designed and written for beginners and uses weight 4/medium/ worsted yarn this pattern can accommodate for different gauges
